Strategic Blue | Clojure, Java, Ruby | London | Full-time | ONSITE | https://strategic-blue.com

Strategic Blue are a small company (11 staff, tech team of 4) working in financing for cloud compute: currently re-selling, but we are getting enough customers now to start spec trading, which is where things get interesting.

Looking to hire one or two experienced devs, not necessarily with any Clojure experience, but decent general development ability, and some exposure to XP practices.

We have a decent package to offer, and you will have plenty of opportunity to influence the business.

Contact t.denley@strategic-blue.com
